text: Darlene Kay Olson Hooley (born April 4, 1939) is an American Democratic politician. She was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from from 1997 to 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== *Darlene Hooley for Congress official campaign site *Hooley & Naito, LLC * * * Darlene Hooley Oral History Interview Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Politicians from North Dakota Category:Educators from North Dakota Category:Educators from Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Darlene Hooley
